message:
Knowing that the world doesn't actually needs a new language .. but I would really like to share with you my new (uncompleted) dynamic language .. with an early draft of its specifications

http://specs.quantitysystem.org/en/latest/RuntimeTypes.html

the calculator can be tested on http://quantitysystem.org

and the source code is available in http://quantitysystem.codeplex.com until I move it into github.

emm the language is concerned about units conversion and keeping consistency of quantities regardless of used units.

for example you can get the length with any unit you want .. aah and you can try currency conversion as well by writing  0<EGP>+1000<USD> for example :D
story: Ahmed Sadek Mohamed Tawfik shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Runtime Types — Quantity System 1.2 documentation
caption: specs.quantitysystem.org
description: All the runtime types are inherited from the QsValue reference type. These types has gone through a careful architecture to describe the sematics of the language elements.

data.message: خااالص .. انا عملتها عشان افهم الرياضة أصلا  :D

Fantastic! 
I never knew about built-in support for physical dimensions (I never even thought about searching for such thing for some reason).

physical units is a large topic. 
It is essential in any engineering application.

I have a fair idea. I was writing some code for a structural design software and I went ahead and implemented a rudimentary physical units subsystem, not knowing that this has already been done in multiple ways before, which was obviously stupid on my side. I learned something new, so thanks.

by the way .. I implemented my solution before F# units .. and didn't know about Frink and java measurement library .. I was thankful to my ignorance because it made inventing something new .. I urge you to complete your implementation .. every one has his own way of thinking and may be yours be more suitable than others implementation.

أستاذ أحمه صادق محمه توفيق، أنت هتعلمني رياضة، وهتخليني برنس في الرياضة، وأنا هتنازلك عن نص حسناتي وهاخد خمسة كيلو سيئات من عندك.
وهدعيلك في ضهر الغيب، وهجيب الجيتار بتاعي وأعزف معاك عالعود للشيخ إمام ونشرب سحلب فاكهة كمان. Deal ؟

شوف بقى .. مادام انتا اللى هتعزم .. يبقى قشطة جدا :D :D .. كونك بقى ان انتا شايفنى كويس فى الرياضة .. فالله اعلم بقى .. انتا كده هتعزمنى كتيييير و انا بحب السحلب اللى بالمكسراااات و هاسحب منه كتيييير :D  ...  فدييييل و عملتلك فريندد ريكويست :D
يا ريتني كنت معاهم ... أنا عايز سحلب ياحمه
عزيزي  محمه، ندر عليا انا وانت نشرب سحلب بالتيكيلا :D
